entry.title: JOHN FALLON: GREAT UNCAPPED CELTS (Part Five)
entry.summary: CQN is turning the spotlight once again on the Celtic players who never had the honour of playing for their country. Goalkeeper John Fallon played an important part in Celtic winning the Scottish Cup when they overcame Dunfermline 3-2 in April 1965 – the club’s first silverware in eight years.
